name: LZ Scroll Up
author: Nazmul Islam

sections.description:
This plugin will add a Scroll To Up button in your site footer right. Here is very easy to setup for change color option and many more. First install the plugin and let’s see.

Features:

  • Easy Customization
  • Super Lightweight
  • Unlimited color Selection
  • Unlimited Font-Awesome Icon Supported
  • Plugin Option Panel
  • 24/7 Support for free

Wanna see how it’s works? Click here : LZ Scroll Up Demo
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin-directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. No need to use any shortcode just instal and go to plugin option panel under the setting.
sections.faq:
Why you use this plugin?

Super lightwight and easy to use.

What are extra facilities of this plugin?

you will get plugin option panel to easily customize this plugin.

Do you found any bugs?

Just Contact Us Click Here: Nazmul Islam.
